name: Stalking Shadows
description:
...when you spend so long trapped in darkness, you find that the darkness begins to stare back...

In Stalking Shadows, you play as Alina, an adventurer who has found herself lost in old ruins littered with strange magic, and even stranger creatures. Your torch light seems to stave away the dark creatures, but as time passes, light itself struggles to exist here. Fortunately, there are magical remnants that return your light, but who knows how many of these remnants remain as you explore, and what will happen if the light completely goes out?

The Team
Spike | Programmer, Level Design
Matt | Programmer
Axcel | 3D Artist, Texture Artist
Lili | Concept Artist, Level Design, Sound Engineer
Mark | 3D Artist
Proterius | Level Design
